title: Fortnite Returns to iPhone (Thanks to Xbox) - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.05.22
description:
Xbox is bringing Fortnite back to iPhones for free -- how big is this going to be? Plus, Greg and Tim run you through Trek to Yomi reviews and the latest games inducted into the Video Game Hall of Fame!

00:00:00 - Start
00:01:22 - Housekeeping
We’re seeing Doctor Strange tonight! Spoiler-Free review is live, In Review records and posts tomorrow!
Kinda Funny’s new merch line is live on kindafunny.com/store, and our new t-shirt design has been revealed for Patreon Platinum members!
https://twitter.com/GameOverGreggy/status/1522232305456099328
Over on kindafunny.com/store, you can get the brand new shirt and hat from Campfire Design Studio that features Portillo the Wiener Dog snug in a bun. Nick from Campfire finished this last year, and it was always on the schedule for this month. Now, part of the proceeds will go to the Central Missouri Humane Society as a way to honor our fallen King.
Similarly, when Portillo passed, Andy shared a Metal Gear Solid-inspired Porty design that he never finished. Well, due to your encouragement – and a lot of yelling from Greg – Andy finished it, and it’s our Platinum item on patreon.com/kindafunny and patreon.com/kindafunnygames this month. If you subscribe at the Platinum tier any time this month, you’ll get the limited edition shirt!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Anonymous & FargoBrady
The Roper Report   -
00:12:05 - Fortnite Returns to iOS (Thanks to Xbox) - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.05.22
00:22:15 - Trek to Yomi Review Round-Up
00:26:50 -  Ad
00:29:50 - Summer Game Fest Dated!
00:33:09 -  - Best Friends Q: BanderSN
00:36:35 - Meanwhile, Xbox’s Showcase should be around 90 Minutes
00:39:35 - Hangar 13 Issues, New Mafia Game in Development - Ethan Gach
00:43:20 - NetEase Launches first US Studio
00:45:49 - Video Games Hall of Fame Inductees
00:51:00 - Out today
00:54:30 - REQUIRED READING: Dread Hunger Became So Unexpectedly Massive on Steam That It Had to Refocus Development Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
https://www.ign.com/articles/dread-hunger-massive-success-content-roadmap-steam
00:54:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Bless
